article: An American girl named Tae Davis held a special party on Saturday moming.  _  the party, there were neither cakes nor candles. There was only a room full of art supplies and many  _  she had never met before. Tae told the children to  _  a picture. The children all love art, and they are all homeless. "These children don't have art supplies to paint, " said Tae. " And I want to  _  the children and make them feel the beauty of art. " Tae got the  _  last year when her art pictures were on sale. Tae was afraid that the children couldn't afford  _  own art supplies and they would give up. So she wrote letters to 50 big art supply  _  to ask for help and she heard from 45 of them. The little girl received a lot of donations from some companies. Tae Davis  _  more than $ 32,000, enough to make a home for children to paint their own pictures. So far, Tae has held three  _  . She was encouraged by the White House. Tae also received the President's Volunteer Service Money.  _  the money is nice , Tae spends it for a different reason to get poor children to enjoy art.
